name: Kaiju Scramble
description:
Kaiju Scramble is a narrative-based game with multiple branching paths set on an island inhabited by giant monsters that lovingly parodies classic Kaiju films and television. Your goal is to escape the island with your life! Your fate is determined by your choices, and this game has three main story paths. Every choice could lead to death, so keep your wits about you as you Scramble to survive!

This game was made using Twine. If you don't like reading, you're out of luck here, buddy.

This game was made by Christopher Hollingsworth, all characters, settings, etc., are his intellectual properties. Parody is legally protected free speech under the Fair Use doctrine... so, please don't sue me, Toho or Tsuburaya. It's not like I'm making any money anyway.
